name: Beats Antique
description: '''Beats Antique''' is a U.S.-based experimental [[world fusion]] and [[electronic music]] group. Formed in 2007 in conjunction with producer [[Miles Copeland III|Miles Copeland]], the group has become noted for their mix of different genres as well as their live shows, which mix samples and heavy percussives with [[Tribal Fusion]] dance and [[performance art]].
